title: Big Sale Going On

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I think some riot employee messed up on the league homepage, or maybe it's intended. Idk, I'm not gonna judge their marketing team.

replies.body: first asol gets negative movespped then lux gets a negative discount. what's next a double negative community?
